pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 22, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nova Scotia, Tim Houston.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the election of the Speaker of the House of Commons.
